definition: deep plowing/thorough penetration/thorough development (of a market segment etc)

sentences.english: The vegetables are growing well through deep plowing and careful cultivation.
sentences.chinese: 經過深耕細作，蔬菜長勢良好。

sentences.english: Effects of deep tillage on root growth and distribution of rice were discussed.
sentences.chinese: 就深耕法對水稻根系生長和分佈的影響進行了討論。

sentences.english: We can certainly increase the productivity of land through deep ploughing and careful management.
sentences.chinese: 通過深耕細作，我們一定可以提高土地產量。

sentences.english: By ploughing deep, the productivity of the soil can be greatly increased.
sentences.chinese: 經過深耕的要領，土地的生產率可以大地面進步。

sentences.english: Third, it requires the enterprise to classify the market.
sentences.chinese: 第三，要深度分銷，深耕市場。

sentences.english: Research has shown that deep tillage with a moldboard plough in the monsoon season can overcome this problem.
sentences.chinese: 研究表明，用有壁犁在季風季節深耕可解決這一問題。

sentences.english: And let there be no purpose in friendship save the deepening of the sprint.
sentences.chinese: 不要對你們的友誼別有企圖，除了追尋心靈的深耕外。

definition: plowing and weeding/farm work/fig. to work or study diligently
to break new ground (for agriculture)/to open up (a new seam)/to develop (border regions)/fig. to open up (new horizons)
rushing to stake one's claim in new markets
innovation/to bring forth new ideas/to blaze new trails
deposits accumulated over long periods/fig. valuable experience, accumulated wisdom
